Description:
Brand new luxury for you!
Set in a peaceful court location on 382m2 (approx) only a stones throw from McAdams Square speciality stores, supermarket, transport and a range of quality schools including Yarra Valley Grammar, Good Sheppard Primary, Yarra Road Primary, Croydon Hills Primary and Luther College, this sparkling new three bedroom home offers a lifestyle of comfort and convenience.
Exuding quality and contemporary style from the luxurious robed bedrooms, master with walk in robe and en suite, to the light filled open plan living area and modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, caesar stone bench tops and impressive glass sliding doors opening to the private outdoor entertaining area, this stunning home is sure to impress first home buyers, downsizers and wise investors alike.
Further features include polished Tassie oak hardwood floors, ducted heating, modern bathroom, low maintenance gardens and double remote lock up garage.
Insights: 49 other 3 bedroom house in CROYDON NORTH have recently been sold.

Description:
Indoors & Outdoors it's Beautiful
Beautifully updated and maintained, this gorgeous family retreat in a tranquil no-through road offers fabulous indoor/outdoor living, entertainment and privacy. Welcoming and inviting, you'll love the wow-factor of the landscaped gardens, modern decor, timber beams, skylights and garden vistas. Discover 4 bedrooms (3 with newly customised fitted BIRs), a renovated family bathroom and master ensuite. The updated kitchen features quality appliances and together with two large living areas (both with garden access) you have wonderful practicality. The big formal lounge and dining room and large family/meals room will appeal to parents and children alike. Stunning landscaped gardens - enclosed at the front and rear - provide a visual feast of colour, textures, water features and connecting pathways. The whole family can relax and entertain enjoying a spa, new deck and two alfresco areas (both covered). Appointments: 2 gas wall furnaces, 2 split systems, remote double garage (storage), 2 sheds and water storage tank. With own gate into park; close to kinder, maternal health centre, bus, shops, Village School and Luther and Oxley Colleges.
Karen Vogl : 0438 072 370

Description:
Iconic Architectural Style With Panoramic Northerly Views
Enjoying the perfect elevated position with uninterrupted panoramic views to Mount Macedon & the Yarra Valley, this stunning home is a unique and beguiling 1960's masterpiece from renowned Australian architect, Charles Duncan. Nestled away from the road in a peaceful leafy setting on 1,480sqm (approx.), the home features spacious open plan entertaining areas - including two living spaces - and a full length sun terrace. With undercover parking for up to 4 vehicles and ingenious plans for further additions, this is a home that demands your inspection.
*Master Wing includes ensuite and walk-in-robe
*2nd bedroom with ensuite; 3rd bed/home office
*Well equipped modern kitchen; separate laundry; ducted heating
*Walk to Luther College & Yarra Valley Grammar
*Moments to Croydon Station, cafes and eateries
*Plans exist to create a further 2 bedrooms, bathroom & living room
Insights: 90 Richardson Road, CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2016 and 3 other 2 bedroom house in CROYDON NORTH have recently been sold.

Description:
Dream 1920's Family Residence
Realise your family dream in this beautifully renovated 1920's weatherboard sanctuary on nearly 1/2 acre. Hidden privately away in a tranquil court near Warrien Reserve, this relaxing 5 bedroom retreat showcases 3 large living zones, quality finishes and designer-style gardens. The bay window, treed outlook and elevated deck will capture your imagination, while the freshly painted interior is defined by 10-ft high ceilings, newly polished floorboards and new carpets. Discover easy living with 5 bedrooms plus an office/study and deluxe bathroom. The big master is bliss; it has full luxury ensuite, split system and WIR. Perfect for entertaining, the Jarrah kitchen boasts s/s 900mm dual oven, dishwasher and servery window to the large covered deck. A huge family/meals room and elegant formal lounge with wood fire and window seat will also impress. The kids will love the rumpus room and bush-style landscaped garden with creek bed, cubby and giant sand pit. Plus: 4-car garage with workshop, sink and storage; ample off street parking; ducted heating; cooling; attic-style storage and water storage. Close to Luther College, Primary schools, transport, shops and EastLink.
Karen Vogl : 0438 072 370

Description:
Comfortable & Care-Free Living
Filled with light, this instantly inviting single level townhouse presents a wonderful opportunity for first home buyers, downsizers and investors alike. Beyond the picturesque facade, a spotless and abundantly spacious interior awaits - featuring 2 generously-sized bedrooms, a central bathroom with separate toilet, a well-appointed kitchen and meals area, and an adjoining lounge highlighted by a glorious bay window. Cleverly proportioned for low maintenance living, the home further offers an incredibly convenient position opposite Warrien Reserve and with a bus stop out front, getting you to North Croydon Shopping Plaza and some of the area's best schools will be a breeze.
Also features:
*Private front garden & rear courtyard
*Gas ducted heating & air conditioning unit
*Carport & shed; Built-in robes (both beds)
*Moments to Croydon Station & Main St shops
*Close to Chirnside Park Shopping Centre
*Near to Yarra Valley Grammar & Luther College

Description:
Sale By Due Date - Tuesday 10th June 2014
Experience designer-style living in this luxurious 10-year young residence. Set in an elite court, you'll enjoy finest quality, from the pure wool carpets, granite kitchen and CaesarStone benchtops (bathrooms), to the high ceilings, exquisite light fittings, premium decor and two decks. Spacious and light, discover 3 double bedrooms (BIRs) plus a study/4th bedroom. Children have their own wing; the master boasts huge WIR and plush ensuite. The granite and 2-Pac kitchen offers you looks and functionality, showcasing touch-open cabinetry, hidden dishwasher and s/s Siemens appliances, including self-cleaning oven, induction cooktop and wok burner. Relax in the formal lounge (gas log fireplace), or entertain effortlessly in the big family/meals room which has stacker doors opening to a large roofed deck with glass balustrade. Extensive lower decking, a Feng Shui pond and private landscaped garden with ornamental pears and magnolias will wow you. Appointments: ducted heating/vacuum, cooling, security camera system, water storage, rem. DLUG, excellent storage and shed. Near Luther College, Primary schools, transport and Yarra Valley Grammar.
Karen Vogl : 0438 072 370

Description:
THE HOME TO ENVY
In a tranquil estate situated on 730m2 (approx), with direct access
through the back gate to Hochkins Ridge nature reserve, this home is an example
of every box ticked with quality and style to spare. From the front classic street
appeal to the stunning, multi-level natural garden courtyard setting at the rear,
every square metre of this property is considered and beautifully manicured. The
masterfully designed layout, creates a feeling of openness and space with tall
ceilings, polished floors and neutral palette complimented by timber accents. The
home has 4 bedrooms consisting of a large master bedroom with bay window,
ensuite and walk-in robe and 3 bedrooms with robes, which are serviced by a
large family bathroom with a corner spa. The formal lounge and dining forms a
separate zone, whilst the kitchen with its stone bench tops flows on to a casual
dining area and a bay window lounge overlooking the nature reserve. There is also
access to an alfresco entertaining deck. The lower level provides a further zone
consisting of an expansive rumpus/billiard room with an adjoining study/workroom
and outside access to under house storage/workshop. The double car garage is
complemented with separate onsite parking. The home incorporates, ducted
heating/cooling/vacuum, cable broadband connection and 2 x 2500 ltr water
tanks. In a truly convenient location near schools, shops and the freeway; whilst
providing a quiet retreat away from it all this is a special home ready to delight
owners and guests alike.
Insights: 44 Nangathan Way, CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2018 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in CROYDON NORTH have recently been sold.

Description:
THE PINNACLE OF FAMILY HOMES
Family function couldn't be made easier with a house like this. Dressed to impress the busiest of households, this gorgeous corner property on 748m2 (approx.) that overlooks the leafy neighbourhood couldn't be better positioned or appointed if it tried.
Arranged over three levels, the lower level is the icing on the cake for this home. Staged as a self-contained unit that would make a great home based business, a private retreat for growing teenagers or young adults who haven't quite made the move to flee the nest yet, or for frequent extended family members or guests.
Complete with a living/meals area, mezzanine bedroom, bathroom/laundry, kitchen and its own Inverter heating and cooling system, this modern escape from the rest of the household is a genius after thought.
The upper two levels accommodate four bedrooms with robes, one of which has ensuite access to a bathroom downstairs; the master bedroom has a full ensuite with bath, whilst the larger family bathroom upstairs comfortably services the other bedrooms and kids retreat.
Dividing the formal lounge and dining room from the casual retreat of the family room and meals area is a family sized kitchen with the warmth of timber cabinetry and the practicality of a 900mm stainless cook top, a wall oven and a dishwasher.
Flowing out to the elevated deck encourages easy outdoor living and entertaining that's surrounded by a picture perfect outlook to the walking tracks and reserves across the road.
There's an impressive selection of Public and State schools nearby, its a short drive to McAdam Square shops or to Chirnside Park, whilst bus services frequent the surrounding streets that connect to nearby shopping centres and schools.
Added appointments include: 9 ft ceilings, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, outdoor 8 seater spa, a 10,000 ltr water tank, plenty of storage and cupboard space inside and out, and a remote double garage.
Insights: 55 Nangathan Way, CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2014 and 16 other 5 bedroom house in CROYDON NORTH have recently been sold.

Description:
COMFORTABLE CONVENIENCE
This large two storey owner occupied unit on 234m2 offers a convenient lifestyle with all the creature comforts. Situated just a short walk from Croydon North Shopping precinct, schools and transport, all amenities are at your fingertips.
Offering three bedrooms, main with walk in robe and en-suite, gas ducted heating and hot water, air conditioning, plenty of storage space, separate toilet and main bathroom upstairs and powder room for your convenience downstairs, living is made easy in this comfortable home.
The main living room with a cosy gas fireplace adjoins the kitchen with gas cook top, dishwasher and meals area. Also featuring a private courtyard and alfresco entertaining area with lovely established low maintenance gardens and spacious double lock up remote garage with internal access, this property is sure to impress!
Insights: 6/33-37 Karingal Street, CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2014 and 49 other 3 bedroom house in CROYDON NORTH have recently been sold.

Description:
Executive Family Lifestyle nearly acre
Overlooking Hochkins Ridge Reserve with magnificent treed views, this exquisite craftsman-built residence will inspire your family life with highest quality and five living areas over three levels. Constructed from Mount Gambier limestone, this majestic residence is positioned high in this elite court on approx. 917 sqm., and offers internal access remote double garage . Beautiful hardwood floors, streams of light and bay windows create pure elegance. Upstairs, you will find a children's retreat, 3 double bedrooms with bir serviced by a family bathroom The elegant master bedroom boasts a parents' retreat, large wir, and a luxurious ensuite featuring spa bath, double shower and double vanity. Space and practicality are yours with a gourmet kitchen featuring s/s 900mm oven, dishwasher and servery window to the formal dining. A big family/meals area opens to the balcony, where you can admire the amazing views over sunset drinks. Open fire places in the formal lounge and large upstairs retreat offer comfort and relaxation in the winter months. A home office (separate entry), downstairs gym/rumpus and workshop give you options for business, family and lifestyle. Further highlights: private, child-friendly landscaped gardens, powder room, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, alarm and excellent storage. Walk to Yarra Rd Primary; close to prestigious private schools including Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, Oxley College, shops, transport and EastLink. PLEASE CALL SHARYN DE VRIES 0401031802 FOR AN INSPECTION.
Insights: 25 BRONTE COURT, CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2014 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in CROYDON NORTH have recently been sold.

Description:
HUGE FAMILY HOME WITH STUNNING VIEWS
This well laid out family home, nestled neatly on a elevated block offers everything the modern family desires. The eye-catching contemporary look is complemented by a updated interior which still maintains some of homes character features.
Ideal for families who love to entertain this home showcases two large outdoor areas, the front with stunning eastern views of the Yarra Valley and the rear which is covered perfect for the cooler months.
Inside a large renovated kitchen with island bench opens to large meals area and adjoining study/5th BR, whilst the front of the home comprises a formal dining and lounge with downstairs access to a huge rumpus already fitted out with pool table and bar area. Towards the rear, 4 more large bedrooms are serviced by two central bathrooms, one of which is newly renovated.
Additional features include Evap. Cooling, gas ducted heating, ceiling fans, polished timber floors and SLUG with enough space for two small cars or one plus workshop.
Surrounded by wonderful parks, walking tracks and quality schools, this brilliant family home is also walking distance to Griff Hunt Reserve, with a bus near your doorstep! Close to Croydon North shopping and cafes and a short drive from Chirnside Park shopping centre, Croydon Town Centre, Eastland and EastLink.
Warren Paas : 0411 558 994

Description:
BUILD YOUR DREAM WITH BREATHTAKING VIEWS
AGENT ON SITE- SATURDAY 3:00- 3:30 PM
A rare and wonderful opportunity awaits to build your families dream home on this elevated block of approx 460 m2. Boasting approved plans and permits for a two-storey 19sq home allowing you to have control of the build, this peaceful location, close to Croydon North shops, parks and excellent schools has it all. Complimented by breathtaking views towards the East that will capture the heart, families will not want to miss this one.
For your convenience, the site has been cleared, fenced and ready to go. For detailed plans and a site inspection call today!

Description:
NATURE RESERVE IS YOUR NEW NEIGHBOUR
Imagine a native outlook from every room, a large rear entertaining deck embracing the treed outlook and sheer privacy of the adjoining nature reserve. You can revel in this enviable setting in the vicinity of Yarra Valley Grammar and Luther College and just a short walk from Yarra Road Primary School.
The single level family home, with its brick and render features, auto roller door on double carport and 827m2 of well cared gardens is smart, spacious and well presented. Providing elegant living plus formal and casual dining, an oversize well equipped kitchen at its heart, plus family zone and rumpus room opening to the huge undercover deck, family living here spells easy living! With abundant storage, a large shower in master ensuite, bay windows and the comfort of central heating and evaporative cooling, sit back and bask in enviable luxury of your green scene surrounds.

Description:
ELUSIVE STREET FRONTAGE
Thoughtfully designed double storey home with large open living area opening onto a rear under roof alfresco with large landscaped rear yard. Master bedroom is downstairs with built in robes and ensuite, upstairs boasts two bedrooms, walk in robe and second bathroom. Features include hostess kitchen with stone bench tops, quality stainless steel appliances and dishwasher. The garage has a remote door and internal access. There is also gas ducted heating and split system air conditioning. Conveniently located a short drive to Eastland, Eastlink and a number of quality schools. Get in early to take advantage of massive stamp duty savings and choose your own internal colour schemes.
Tony Smith - Project Sales : 0411 424 964

Description:
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY!
PRIOR OFFERS INVITED!
Open For Inspection: Saturday 3rd May, 12.30pm-1.00pm.
Quality vacant land is definitely at a premium but when you get a big block of approximately 1500 square metres with huge views over the treetops to distant mountains, great privacy and awesome location, then its just about priceless.
Beautifully positioned at the end of a long, private driveway, the block is also well treed to give it a sensational natural environment and has a park and bus stop within a few hundred metres.
Schools, shops and most other services and facilities a family will want are also easily accessed by a reasonable walk or short drive in the car.
Aside from the views, the other appealing feature of the block is the fabulous building envelope that will let you design your dream home (STCA) to fit in the setting perfectly and at the same time make the most of the views over the Yarra Valley and towards Kinglake.
Insights: 118 Exeter Road, CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
Family Balance and Bliss
A gorgeous gabled weatherboard façade is the perfect invitation to this cleverly zoned stylish home, peacefully set on a generous 1000sqm approx allotment in easy reach of all conveniences. 2 large well appointed living domains; Lounge Dining and Family Kitchen Meals with well equipped near new Impala Kitchen, Ilve oven, Miele dishwasher and extensive cabinetry, offer fabulous flexibility for families. Spilling outdoors to a wrap-around deck with glorious views of the expansive leafy garden and flows through to an exceptionally sized and separate Master with ensuite (frameless showerscreen) and WIR (also suitable for young adults and guests because of its unique privacy). Set up for families with a nice flowing floorplan, 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (including 2 ensuites) and close proximity to Good Shepherd Primary, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Chirnside Park, McAdam Square cafes and shops, public transport and the freeway. Extra features: gas ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, hardwood floors, underhouse storage, large laundry, remote single garage and off street parking.
Land: 1000 sq. metres approx

Description:
Exquisitely Renovated & Exceptionally Placed
A stunning renovation has rejuvenated this magnificent 3 bedroom home proudly positioned just moments from quality schools and parks. Immaculate inside and out, polished floorboards and a contemporary colour palette enrich the home's interior which showcases a comfortable living domain. A spacious and European-appointed kitchen/meals area and covered deck overlook a generously-sized, secure landscaped backyard beautifully framed with lush gardens and complete with its own separate studio/bungalow. Perfect for first home buyers or a young family, there is nothing left to do but move in and enjoy.
Also features:
*SS appliances; Built-in robes (beds 1 & 3)
*Reverse cycle split system heating & cooling
*Modern central bathroom; Off-street parking
*Near to an array of parks incl. Griff Hunt Oval & Hochkins Ridge Reserve
*Close to Oxley Christian College & Village School
*Moments to Croydon North Shopping Plaza & buses

Description:
Welcoming Family Home with Style & Space
Beautifully combining suburban convenience with the nearby rural tranquillity, this exceptional brick home presents the ideal setting for young families, offering 3 bedrooms plus study and a large yard complete with an alfresco deck. Taking full advantage of its elevated and family-friendly 731SQM(approx) position, it provides spaces that are both generous and light filled including a formal lounge and dining domain and a casual open plan living area.
Also features:
*Freshly painted; Fully renovated ensuite
*Polished floorboards; SS appls; Double garage
*Ducted heating & evaporative cooling
*Close to Luther College & Yarra Valley Grammar
*Near to Hochkins Ridge Reserve & bus services
*Moments to McAdam SQ & Chirnside Park shops

Description:
*UNDER CONTRACT*
This convenient and peacefully located brick veneer home on 847m2 (approx) close to McAdams Square and a quality selection of schools including Yarra Valley Grammar, Good Sheppard Primary, Croydon Hills Primary and Luther College is packed with features sure to suit your family. Whether relaxing at home or utilising the BBQ facilities and picturesque walking tracks at Warrien Reserve, just a short walk away, entertaining small or large groups will be a breeze.
With a private hedged front yard and quaint cottage gardens, this comfortable three bedroom home features built in robes, master with full en-suite and walk in robe plus a fourth bedroom/study also with built in robes. The kitchen including 900mm gas cook top, breakfast bar, ample cupboard space and dishwasher overlooks the two large covered alfresco entertaining areas.
Further highlights include ducted vacuum, polished floor boards, evaporative cooling, fans in bedrooms, gas ducted heating, double lock up remote garage with through roller door rear yard access and a large equipment shed.
Move fast and arrange an inspection today!

Description:
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY
PRIOR OFFERS ARE INVITED!
Make your first or retirement home a good one! Like this! Positioned in a friendly neighbourhood thats really handy to amenities, this lovely three bedroom home presents exceptionally well.
The 490m2 (approx.) block offers a garden that can be enjoyed by green thumbs, young children and by adults who enjoy outdoor entertaining on the deck.
Inside features robes in all the bedrooms, a lounge room, immaculate kitchen and bathroom facilities, a meals zone that flows out to the deck and the comforts of ducted heating and split system cooling.
Theres also a double garage, a 2000 litre water tank, large garden shed and a paved courtyard to complete this convincing property.
